title: A superhydrophobic nanocrystalline MOF embedded starch@cotton composite for fast, selective and nanomolar sensing and adsorptive removal of a fluorinated herbicide from aqueous medium
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00289J, Paper
Subhrajyoti Ghosh, Paltan Laha, Shyam Biswas
The tacking of environmental pollution associated with the excessive use of harmful, non-biodegradable agrochemicals is one of the alarming concerns of modern-day environmental science researchers. Various herbicides belong to the...
